嶡字的基本解释

嶡
jué
中国夏代祭祀时盛牺牲的器具：“俎，有虞氏以梡，夏后氏以嶡。”

嶡
guì
崛起：“浩然之气，嶡乎与天地一。”

嶡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jué］
［《集韻》居月切，入月，見。］
古代陈列祭品的木器。形如今之小方几，有四足，足间有横档。
[②]［guì］
［《集韻》姑衛切，去祭，見。］
崛起貌。

嶡字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嶡； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页320第09
【集韻】姑衞切，音貴。山崛起貌。　又【集韻】居月切，音厥。俎名。【禮·明堂位】夏后氏以嶡。【註】嶡之言蹷也。謂中足爲橫距之象。周禮謂之距。

考證：〔【禮·明堂位】夏后氏用嶡。〕　謹照原文用改以。
嶡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嶡字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
abrupt
jué
An instrument used for sacrifices during the Xia Dynasty in China: "You, there is Yu clan Yizhen, Xiahou clan Yizheng."
abrupt
guì
Rise: "The aura of Haoran is one with the heaven and the earth."

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jué］
["Jiyun" cuts into the month, enters the month, see you. ]
Ancient wooden wares on display of sacrificial offerings. The shape is now small and square, with four legs and crosspieces between the feet.
[②]［guì］
["Ji Yun" Gu Wei cut, go to the festival, see you. ]
Rise appearance.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嶡; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 320 No. 09
[Jiyun] Guwei cut, the sound is expensive. The appearance of the rising mountain.　[Jiyun] Juyue cut, sound Jue. First name. 【Rite·Ming Hall】The Xiahou clan is based on the abundance. [Note] The words of 嶡 are also sloppy. It is said that the midfoot is the image of the horizontal distance. Zhou Li said the distance. Textual research: [[Rite·Mingtang Location] Xiahou's family 嶡. 〕 　 I would like to use the original text instead.
